definitions.explanation_en: A masculine given name of Irish origin, derived from the name John, meaning 'God is gracious'. Commonly used in English-speaking countries as a first name.
definitions.explanation_cn: 源自爱尔兰语的男性名字，由 John 演变而来，意为‘上帝是仁慈的’。在英语国家中常作为人名使用。
definitions.example_en: Shawn Mendes is a popular Canadian singer-songwriter.
definitions.example_cn: 肖恩·门德斯是一位受欢迎的加拿大创作歌手。
